text: This is a list of National Hockey League (NHL) players who have played at least one game in the NHL from 1917 to present and have a last name that starts with "A". ==Aalto - Allen== Player Position Country Birthplace Played Teams ↓ Notes Antti Aalto Centre Lappeenranta, Finland 1997–01 Anaheim Ducks George Abbott Goaltender Sydenham, Ontario 1943–44 Boston Bruins Reg Abbott Centre Winnipeg, Manitoba 1952–53 Montreal Canadiens Justin Abdelkader Centre Muskegon, Michigan 2008- Detroit Red Wings Clarence "Taffy" Abel Defence Sault Ste.
